name: The Michishort Hold
description:
This game is a submission for: My First Game Jam: Summer 2022

The Michishort Hold is a top-down semi-tower defense game where you play as an alchemist that mixes potion to heal the energy of the defending mage. Heal your mage as they fend off the monster that’s forcing its way through the hold, although the monster's target is you… 

  • Dodge enemy attack while gathering resources to mix potions for the mage
  • Easy top-down controls

//Controls:
W,A,S,D - movements
Left Mouse - Mix/Throw Potion
